content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) that receives iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) that receives iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) that receives coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) that receives coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you are aware of the current resources available, especially after harvesting or crafting activities.
